item.title: Valentine add a quote by Proust Marcel
item.description: "with one image he would make that beauty explode into me." -- Proust Marcel

item.title: Valentine add a quote by Terri Windling
item.description: "I wish I could have known Barbara Bodichon -- and her whole vibrant circle of smart, fearless women friends. I'd like to gather them all around the dinner table, along with a few smart, fearless friends of my own. We'd open a bottle of wine and sit back to to hear their stories -- marveling at all the things that have changed, and commiserating about all the things that haven't. And then we'd tell them <em>thank you</em>. We'd tell them that we never take for granted the rights they fought so hard for. And that we hope we, too, can make the world just a little better for the ones who follow after." -- Terri Windling

item.title: Valentine add a quote by Simone Weil
item.description: "Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity." -- Simone Weil
